Name: Ace Of Clubs Daiquiri
Ingredients: 60 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
15 ml Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Garnish with a dusting of chocolate powder.
Review: A Daiquiri with a hint of chocolate.
History: Created in the 1930s at a Bermudian nightclub of the same name.
Nutrition: One serving of Ace Of Clubs Daiquiri contains 190 calories
